entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as growling and wanting to kill someone with his bare hands. He is also mentioned as being restrained by Harry and Dean.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as hanging onto Ron's arms and trying to restrain him.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as hanging onto Ron's arms along with Harry.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as barking orders and trying to take the students to Herbology class.

entities.name: herbology
entities.description: Herbology is mentioned as a subject that Snape wants to take the students to.

relationships.description: Harry and Dean are restraining Ron from attacking someone.
Snape is taking the students to Herbology class.
